TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescriptors
TABLE.COMMENT: die Bildungsstandards=Deskriptoren

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Die ID des Datensatzes am zentralen Server, für Import wichtig

TABLE.NAME: block_exacomptopics
TABLE.COMMENT: Schwerpunkte, Kategorie der Deskriptoren

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Die ID des Datensatzes am zentralen Server, für Import wichtig

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompsubjects
TABLE.COMMENT: Gegenstände, Kategorie der Schwerpunkte

FIELD.NAME: infolink
FIELD.COMMENT: link to external description for comp grid

FIELD.NAME: isglobal
FIELD.COMMENT: is the subject a global subject

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompschooltypes
TABLE.COMMENT: Schultypen, Kategorie der Gegensände

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompedulevels
TABLE.COMMENT: Ober oder Unterstufe, Kategorie für Schultypen

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescrtopic_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordnung Deskriptoren zu schwerpunkten

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompexamples
TABLE.COMMENT: Beispiele die für bestimmte Deskriptoren bestimmt sind

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Die ID des Datensatzes am zentralen Server, für Import wichtig

FIELD.NAME: creatorid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the user who created this custom example

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescrexamp_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordung Deskriptoren zu beispielen

FIELD.NAME: table_foreign
FIELD.COMMENT: descr or cross or topic or subje

TABLE.NAME: block_exacomptaxonomies
TABLE.COMMENT: blumsche taxonomie, attribute zu den beispielen

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcompactiv_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordnung aufgaben zu deskriptoren oder topics festlegen

FIELD.NAME: activityid
FIELD.COMMENT: Entweder course_module id oder Exabis Eportfolio item id

FIELD.NAME: activitytitle
FIELD.COMMENT: Name der Aktivität. Dient nur als Backup, damit Name bei Löschen des Kurses nicht verloren geht

FIELD.NAME: coursetitle
FIELD.COMMENT: Dient zum Sichern des Kurstitels, falls dieser gelöscht werden sollte

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompskills
TABLE.COMMENT: ESP, Fähgigkeiten

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcompuser_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: In dieser Tabelle wird gespeichert, welche User welche Deskriptoren oder Topics von welcher Aufgabe erfüllen und zustäzlich wer den Eintrag gemacht hat, also Lehrer oder Schüler.

FIELD.NAME: reviewerid
FIELD.COMMENT: Benutzerid dessen, der bewertet ob Kompetenz erfüllt ist. Kann entweder ein Schüler sein (Selbsteinschätzung), oder ein Lehrer

FIELD.NAME: role
FIELD.COMMENT: Speichert ob der Bewertende ein Schüler oder Lehrer ist. 1=Lehrer 0=Schüler

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: hier ist eine bewertung nach einem schema des lehrers möglich

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompmdltype_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: Diese Tabelle speichert den Schultyp der jeweiligen Moodleinstanz

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: used for the alternative data model because here the this configuration is not used globally for the whole moodle instance but for a specific course

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcoutopi_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: In dieser Tabelle werden die Zuordnungen der einzelnen Kurse zu Schwerpunkten gespeichert

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcompuser
TABLE.COMMENT: In dieser Tabelle wird gespeichert, welcher Benutzer welchen Deskriptor oder welches Topic erfüllt. Zusätzlich wer die Kompetenzermittlung durchgeführt hat, also Schüler oder Lehrer

FIELD.NAME: compid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID des erfüllten Deskriptors oder Topics

FIELD.NAME: gradingisold
FIELD.COMMENT: shows if the grading is old / if there exists a newer grading in one of the childcompetences

FIELD.NAME: globalgradings
FIELD.COMMENT: the text that shows the gradings of all teachers on this descriptor/competence, even in different courses

FIELD.NAME: gradinghistory
FIELD.COMMENT: the text that shows the history of gradings in this course on this descriptor

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompsettings
TABLE.COMMENT: Bewertungsschema des Kurses festlegen

FIELD.NAME: activities
FIELD.COMMENT: the hidden activities of edit activities table

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompprofilesettings
TABLE.COMMENT: This table stored the individual user settings for generating their competence profile

FIELD.NAME: block
FIELD.COMMENT: This field stores the associated block: exacomp, exastud or exaport

FIELD.NAME: itemid
FIELD.COMMENT: this field stores the associated item, either periodid if block is exastud, courseid if block is exacomp or itemid if block is exaport

FIELD.NAME: feedback
FIELD.COMMENT: this field indicates if verbal feedback should be displayed (for exastud reviews)

FIELD.NAME: span
FIELD.COMMENT: span tells if the niveau is a link over multiple niveaus

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompexameval
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcategories
TABLE.COMMENT: used for additional info

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescbadge_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: badges require descriptors to get awarded

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompitemexample
TABLE.COMMENT: this table is used in the lovevet app

FIELD.NAME: teachervalue
FIELD.COMMENT: evaluation value from teacher, may range from 0-100

FIELD.NAME: studentvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: evaluation student value, may range from 0-100

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompexternaltrainer
TABLE.COMMENT: is used for assigning students to external trainers for the app

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcrosssubjects
TABLE.COMMENT: Cross-Subjects beinhalten Teilmengen von allen verfügbaren Deskriptoren

FIELD.NAME: sourceid
FIELD.COMMENT: Die ID des Datensatzes am zentralen Server, für Import wichtig

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescrcross_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordnung Deskriptoren zu Cross-Subjects

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcrossstud_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordnung Schüler zu Cross-Subjects (Freigabe)

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescrvisibility
TABLE.COMMENT: Visibility of descriptor in context of course, topic and student

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompexampvisibility
TABLE.COMMENT: Visibility of example in context of course, topic and student

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompschedule
TABLE.COMMENT: schedule for tasks

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the course in which the example is treated

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdatasources
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompdescrcat_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordnung Deskriptoren zu kategorien

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompexampletax_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: zuordnung Examples zu Taxonomien

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompsubjniveau_mm
TABLE.COMMENT: subj niveau

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompeval_niveau
TABLE.COMMENT: evaluation niveau

TABLE.NAME: block_exacomptopicvisibility
TABLE.COMMENT: Visibility of topic in context of course and student

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompsolutvisibility
TABLE.COMMENT: defines the visibility of example solutions

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompautotestassign
TABLE.COMMENT: table stores infos for competence assignments from scheduled tasks based on quiz gradings

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompimporttasks
TABLE.COMMENT: table stores settings for scheduler importing tasks

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompwsdata
TABLE.COMMENT: table stores different data for web services

FIELD.NAME: token
FIELD.COMMENT: security token, aka private access key

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcmsettings
TABLE.COMMENT: table stores settings for course modules

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcmassign
TABLE.COMMENT: table stores infos for competence assignments from scheduled tasks based on activities (restricted access)

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompcohortcode
TABLE.COMMENT: table stores cohortcodes for diggr

TABLE.NAME: block_exacompglobalgradings
TABLE.COMMENT: In dieser Tabelle wird gespeichert, welcher Globalgradignstext zu einem Subject/Topic/Competence gespeichert ist

FIELD.NAME: globalgradings
FIELD.COMMENT: the text that shows the gradings of all teachers on this descriptor/competence, even in different courses
